mapper.select: SELECT count(t.template_start) as count ,sum(t.template_start) as sum FROM user_temp_attention t where t.template_id = #{id}

SELECT ( SELECT sum( template_start ) AS startCount FROM user_temp_attention WHERE template_type = ut.template_type ) startCount, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS downLoadCount FROM user_temp_attention WHERE template_type = ut.template_type ) downLoadCount, ut.template_type FROM user_template ut WHERE ut.user_id != #{userId} AND ut.shared = '1' AND ut.`status` != '0'
and ut.name like concat('%', #{condition}, '%')
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_temp_attention uua WHERE uua.user_id = #{userId} AND uua.template_type = ut.template_type ) GROUP BY ut.template_type
ORDER BY downLoadCount desc, startCount desc
ORDER BY startCount desc, downLoadCount desc
